headline: I always remember to forget
description: A reflective, symbolic sketch titled 'Alphaphant?', exploring themes of memory, forgetting, and the paradox of holding onto what we strive to let go.
whyItMatters: Highlights the persistent tension between remembering and forgetting, and how our identity is shaped by both the preservation and the release of memories.

motifMap.symbolism: Internal dialogue, dismissiveness of self-imposed anxieties
Complexity and contradiction inherent in human cognition

articleExcerpt: I always remember to forget. A sketch exploring the tension and paradox in memory.

associatedMedia.description: Hand-drawn sketch from notebook depicting an elephant overlaid with text 'Child Please' and 'I always remember to forget'.
